titleStmt.title: Laws and ordinances of war established for the good of his Majesties army in Ireland. / By the Lord Lieutenant General, and general commander of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ..., and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Lord Lieutenant General and general commander of Ireland = Arthur, Earl of Essex.
Dated at end: Given at his Majesties castle of Dublin the 21th day of September 1672 and in the 24th year of his Majesties reign.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
